/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, teeming with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. Power lines crisscross above the street, forming an intricate web against the sky. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the varied hues of the buildings and vehicles.
